sections.markdown:
Before exploring the individual archetypes, we must understand **The Choice** - the 22nd archetype that stands apart from the three cycles. Ra calls it "the axis upon which the creation turns."

**Why study The Choice first?** Because all 21 other archetypes serve to bring consciousness toward this fundamental decision. Understanding The Choice illuminates the purpose of the entire system.

![The Choice](/images/tarot/tarot22.jpg)

In traditional tarot numbering, this position corresponds to what is often called "The Fool." However, Ra names this archetype simply "The Choice" - a far more precise description of its function. Ra's conception should not be confused with traditional Fool interpretations.

sections.text: The choice is, as you put it, the work of a moment but is the axis upon which the creation turns.
sections.context: Ra describes the central importance of The Choice.
highlight: the axis upon which the creation turns

sections.text: Furthermore, there are relationships betwixt mind, body, and spirit of the same location in octave, for instance: one, eight, fifteen, and relationships within each octave which are helpful in the pursuit of The Choice by the mind/body/spirit complex. The Logos under which these foundations stand is one of free will. Thusly the foundations may be seen to have unique facets and relationships for each mind/body/spirit complex. Only twenty-two, The Choice, is relatively fixed and single.
sections.context: Ra explains why The Choice is unique among archetypes - all others vary by individual.
highlight: Only twenty-two, The Choice, is relatively fixed and single
helpful in the pursuit of The Choice

sections.markdown:
**What is The Choice?**

The fundamental polarity decision of third density: **Service to Others** or **Service to Self**.

- This is not a single decision but a continuous orientation made moment by moment
- The Choice is "relatively fixed and single" - unlike other archetypes which have "unique facets" for each entity
- All other archetypes exist to bring consciousness to the point of making this decision
- The higher densities do their work "due to the polarity gained in this choice"

Ra reveals that properly understanding The Choice was their own "great breakthrough" after completing third density.

sections.text: The one great breakthrough which was made after our work in third density was done was the proper emphasis given to the Arcanum Number Twenty-Two which we have called The Choice. In our own experience we were aware that such an unifying archetype existed but did not give that archetype the proper complex of concepts in order to most efficaciously use that archetype in order to promote our evolution.
sections.context: Ra admits their own understanding of The Choice evolved after third density.
highlight: proper emphasis given to the Arcanum Number Twenty-Two

sections.markdown:
**The Choice Pairs with the Significators**

The Significator (the complex self) is paired with The Choice because:
- The Significator IS the self - in mind (5), body (12), and spirit (19)
- The Choice is what that self exists to make
- The whole being must participate in this fundamental decision

As you study each Significator in the coming lessons, remember this pairing. The self that wills, acts, and connects is the self that chooses.

sections.question: Why is Archetype 22 unique among all the archetypes?

options.text: It is the most difficult to understand
options.explanation: Ra doesn't describe it as most difficult. Its uniqueness is that it is "relatively fixed and single" while others have unique facets for each entity.

options.text: It is relatively fixed and single, while others vary by individual
options.explanation: Ra states: "Only twenty-two, The Choice, is relatively fixed and single." Other archetypes have "unique facets and relationships for each mind/body/spirit complex."

options.text: It was created by Egyptian priests, not Ra
options.explanation: All 22 archetypes originated with Ra on Venus. Egyptian priests created visual images but not the concepts.

options.text: It only applies to the spirit cycle
options.explanation: The Choice stands apart from all three cycles and pairs with all three Significators. It applies to the whole being.

sections.prompt: The Choice is made moment by moment, not once. Reflecting on recent days, what choices have reinforced your polarity? When did you feel pulled toward service to self versus service to others?
guidingThoughts: The Choice is continuous, not a single event
Awareness of choice is the beginning of conscious evolution
